title: Beef Tortellini With Arugula And Sun-dried Tomatoes
summary: Need a gluten free, primal, fodmap friendly, and ketogenic main course? Beef Tortellini With Arugulan And Sun-dried Tomatoes could be a super recipe to try. For $3.08 per serving, this recipe covers 27% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One portion of this dish contains around 33g of protein, 40g of fat, and a total of 532 calories. This recipe serves 4. This recipe is liked by 1 foodies and cooks. If you have arugula, beef tortellini, coarse salt and ground pepper, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the butter you could follow this main course with the Cinnamon Butter Cake as a dessert. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 15 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 70%. This score is good. Similar recipes include Spinach Quiche with Sun-Dried Tomatoes, Cheese Tortellini with Pesto and Sun Dried Tomatoes, and Cheese Tortellini Pasta Salad with Tomatoes, Arugula, and Mozzarella.
